parameters: I... I'm not sure what this is,
Oh my, to approach me with such a cute face.
It makes me want to eat you so badly.
Hm... For your journey to Parlates,
it would be better if you visited \C[17]Ront\C[0] first, perhaps?
Ront... Is that the name of a star?
Ront is a newborn star, relatively free of danger.
In truth, I'd love for you to go wherever you like,
but the older stars are a little...
So the stars are not born simultaneously.
Tyvar, lord of Virea, the oldest of all,
was the first to cooperate with me.
I see. You mean to say that the stars
are ordered by whoever cooperated with you first?
Correct again. If you become a Lord of Reason,
...Well then, I suppose I should head for that star?
But how should I travel there?
It's pretty easy to get there, but...
Before that, there's something I need to tell you.
Are you any good at fighting?
Parlates has a low concentration of mana,
so female type monsters are abundant.
and you're a boy, so that's also a disadvantage.
You'll likely be attacked for claim to your Mana.
...Just in case, you DO know about Mana, right?
──\N[10], of course you know too, right?
Don't tell me, you really don't know about Mana?
W-well then... Let me explain in brief.
Mana is the source of life, and in essence,
all things possess and require Mana.
That is to say that we cannot even live without Mana,
and the search for it even results in conflict.
There are two primary methods to obtaining Mana.
One is to slay a creature, and usurp its life force...
From fluids specific to males, you can...
...Just who, were you talking to just now?
That fake smile is most foul.
You can tell me, y'know? I'll forgive you no matter what.
Even the newest stars can't avoid the threat of monsters.
For you to be alone... It might still be too dangerous.
That's why I'll prepare a companion for you.\!
I'm ordering you to help Ino here during his journey.
Make sure to provide proper support.
Ino? What kind of Theban princess name is──
you want me to help this guy?
Please protect him from female monsters for me.
You know, I'm not good at fighting either.
You can't just ask me to do something like that.
He's plenty safe as long as a girl like you is around.
She'll accompany you for the journey.
...Pleased to travel with you, Miss Fiede.
Could you say that any louder?
Looks more fun than sitting here all day, so sure.
Characters who first become your companion,
will not have learned any Skills initially.
Please teach them new \C[17]Skills\C[0] from the menu.
Characters other than Ino do not acquire LP for each
level, but only when they reach certain level thresholds.
To reset the obtained skills of Ino's companions,
you can simply talk to them on the map.
Fiede is in Ainoa, in the room upstairs.
I should be letting you go with Fiede,
and enjoy your carefree trip or whatever, but...
I have to tell you one last, very important thing.
Within Parlates, you will never die. Ever.
In other words, no one dies here.
The concept of "Death" does not even exist in this world.
Simply put, it's the rules, the Reason I gave to this world.
No one here shall fear death, ever.
At that moment, I really did...
However, for such a cute boy like you, death might
just not be the most dangerous thing you face.
Fiede, I'll leave you two to it, okay?
Now then, time to teach you how you can
These things are called \C[17]Reason of Wings\C[0].
They're all over the place, and all of them are
By touching one of them, you can move to it from
another one. Right now, you can also move to
Please don't take away my kind words like this...!
What's with you, you're causing a racket.
You're the one who told me to help this guy, y'know?
But I want to help Ino here, too!
...I wonder how I should react to this situation.
The Reason of Wings also has other functions.
Would you like to learn about \C[17]Reason of Wings\C[0]?
\C[17]Reason of Wings\C[0] are objects scattered in various places.
Once interacted, you can move to one of them
from another Reason of Wings connected to it.
Interacting with it also \C[17]fully recovers the entire party\C[0].
You can also \C[17]initialize Ino's Skills\C[0] with it.
You can move around more easily the more you use it.
Please use the Reason of Wings at your convenience.
Ordwald also has something rather similar.
It's for returning to this Reason of Wings.
Always handy no matter how far away you are.
Hmm, I wonder what Ront is like...
Miss Tahati and Miss Fiede seems to have
Would you like to learn about Events?
Events have appeared in Earthless Ainoa.
You can start one by interacting with people with \I[127].
The events can then be viewed in the \C[3]Adventurer's Note\C[0].
Started events are automatically added to the item's list.
You can examine the details of each event in the list,
and if the conditions are met, they will be completed.
During an event, \I[126] will appear above anyone involved.
If you find one, make sure to interact with them.
Also, events will pop up in various places in the future.
Some may also be automatically added to the list.
Lord Candidate, I will listen to you, meow.
I am a very capable messenger, meow.
An indispensable existence for living here... meow!
What kind of work can you do?
Fufufu... I'll show you what I can do,
so go get ready before calling me again, mrow.
\C[17]Able Familiar\C[0] has been added to the event list.
Miss Familiar, please show me your power.
...As demonstrated, I can guide the Lord Candidate
Can we go to other rooms besides that one?
What a loud mouth for such a small little runt...
Then next time, I'll show you my true power!
Hah, is that the best you can do?
I'll take it as a compliment since I'm so small and cute!
\C[17]Able, Serious Familiar\C[0] has been added to the event list.
Oi, you said you were gonna show me your
true power, right? Try it, if you even have one!
Y-you didn't have to be so aggressive...
I can manage the Lord Candidate's companions!
Would you like to learn about Party Setup?
By talking to the white cat familiar in Earthless Ainoa,
During party formation, you can add or
remove any of Ino's companions from the party.
When you find a new companion, let's consider it.
It is a very convenient ability!
We can, like, totally do that ourselves.
Well, it is a big deal, so I'll leave that to you.
the Lord Candidate has reason with him.
I'm sure he's just being nice.
Books on the history of Ordwald are lined up.
You can fix problems that may occur when saving
data from the previously released trial version.
テキストピクチャの設定

parameters.text:
新大陸北部、通称「透明の地」──
　　　その調査記録から読み取れる情報

　　　属性を喰らうものの存在：
　　　繭のような形状。基本的に動かない
　　　闇以外の属性を周囲から奪い、蓄える
　　　自身は闇属性を持つと考えられる

parameters: テキスト =    　　　新大陸北部、通称「透明の地」── 　　　…
テキストピクチャの設定

parameters.text:
過去に形態を変え活動した例がある
　　　自身の属性と蓄えた属性が均等になったとき
　　　そうした状態になる可能性が高い

　　　その後、引き続き属性を奪い続け活動停止
　　　再び繭へと形態を戻した

parameters: テキスト =    　　　過去に形態を変え活動した例がある 　　　…
